channel.title: Hidden help
channel.description:
well I was wondering if anyone can help me with this.
How do i make it so when a mod - owner jails ect it says like
'you have been jailed buy 'name''
however (main bit)
when a hidden jails u, it says
You havve been jailed by a hidden please wait till mod+ is on

item.title: Hidden help
item.dc:creator: @smite_range smite range
item.description:
@smite_range wrote:

Sorry, but i mean like it it was a mod jailing it would say

‘You have been jailed by (the mods name)’
^Same with admin and owner^

But if it was a hidden it would say.

‘You have been jailed, please report if abused’

Read full topic

item.title: Hidden help
item.dc:creator: @al_sk8r al sk8r
item.description:
@al_sk8r wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3015;
c.teleportToY = 3194;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You Have been thrown in jail!”);
c.sendMessage(“I would say sorry if I were you”);
c.teleblock = true

Read full topic

item.title: Hidden help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Could I see your current jail command?

Read full topic
